Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.view

Interface InputSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
CardSelectorController, ChoicesPanelController, InterruptibleStdInput, MatchSetupPanel, PlayerCreatorController, StdPlayerCreator
public interface InputSource

Classes implementing this interface are supposed to be able to transmit data to an implementation of InputMediator.

Producer of the InputMediator - InputSource connexion, where the InputMediator is an intermediary consumer.

Implemented by classes able to collect user-input directly, like InterruptibleStdInput and the controllers instantiated by classes of the view level.

Call a variant of InputMediator::receive() when overriding the post methods.

See Also:
  • InputMediator

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    post()
    Transmits an empty signal, containing no information but a notification, to a known input consumer (like InputMediator).
    void
    post(Player p)
    Transmits an instance of Player or null to a known input consumer (like InputMediator).
    void
    post(String str)
    Transmits the given String to a known input consumer (like InputMediator).
